page.title: 16Trade in Pennington
page.content: In our block there are three main villages;Swarthmoor,Loppergarth and Marton. Each one has shops and buisnesses. Swarthmoor has 3 grocery shops,a post office,a laundrette and a ladies hairdresser.There is also a garage and three pubs plus a Club which sells beer.Near the village is another pub and a hotel.The village also has 2 painters and decorators,one plumber,2 milkmen,1 piano tuner and a man who hires out his mechanical excavator.Loppergarth has a post office which used to sell groceries bet now just sells antiques.There is a pub,"The Wellington",and a repair garage at Rowe Head.One lady also takes in ironing.Marton has no shops but it has a pub called The New Inn. People go to Lindal if they want to buy groceries or stamps.
